text:
As #chloroquine is being looked into as a potential treatment for #COVID19, the #OpenAccess article from 2019 on methods for quantifying chloroquine and its metabolites in human blood samples is available to read on our website: https://t.co/X6WJyeAJoK

@MahidolU @NDMOxford https://t.co/H9lKOFaFuy
